* 'Devil Gigatron knows peace isn't the answer because of the amount of 
monkey crap bots on this past Earth ' ???!!!!!
< Monkey crap bots??!!!>
SBM: " Hay! I'm offended!! Monkey crap bots, huh?! Well that sack of 
numb-nuts should look in the mirror some Goddamned day!!"
Iron Raptor's expression turned almost instantly from blank to annoyed as 
that comment that rang though her mind. And couldn't help but agree  as she 
looked up at Devil Gigatron through the shaded visor that covered her eyes, 
only to have it retract as she ran her index finger down the bridge of her 
nose from the center of her forehead. Closing her eyes with a strained sigh.
This wasn't a plea for an alliance anylonger. This was an insult that was 
only growing larger by the second.
Until finally it was decided that this was going to stop.
Silently turning to AzureBlade, Iron motioned him to follow before starting 
on her own towards the gats to the Maximal City.
Looking over her shoulder she waved to Devil Gigatron.*

" Get back to me when you're going to be a bit more respectful. Bye."

* And with that her face turned back towards the great gates which stood 
tall and solid before her. Silently opening a cripted transmission to Cyndro 
which read: Fire if he tries anything. Otherwise, just keep the base 
defences on full until he's gone.*
